alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL GULF...CALHOUN COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA AND WEST CENTRAL LIBERTY COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA THROUGH 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/... At 302 PM EDT/202 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northwest of Stonemill Creek, or 16 miles west of Blountstown, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Honeyville, Clarksville, Red Oak, Abe Springs, Sharpstown, Chipola Cutoff, Red Hill, Marysville, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Estiffanulga, Frink, Kinard, Lewis, and Woods. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
